header.title: Connect, Learn, and Grow
header.subtitle: Be part of a community that drives your professional development
header.description: We share knowledge, opportunities, and much more to help you move forward.

main.title: Who are we?
main.description: At Zemios, we are a passionate community of professionals and students in the digital world, united by continuous learning and growth. We have created a space where each member can learn, teach, and connect with others. Our goal is to drive personal and professional development, fostering collaboration and opportunities for everyone.
main.join-description: Sign up on our platform and create your profile.
main.connect-description: Share your experiences and learn from other programmers like you.
main.collaborate-description: Choose projects where you can contribute and that match your level.
main.learn-description: Access resources and courses to keep developing your skills.
main.opportunities-description: Network and get references that will help your career.

secondary.title: Join us
secondary.description: Be part of a vibrant community that shares knowledge, opportunities, and projects. Together, we can grow and achieve new goals!
secondary.questions: Do you have any questions? Contact us:

footer.title: Would you like to support us? Make a small donation and help Zemios grow.
